i just bought the movie Ghost Dog and have not watched it yet, but 
from the comentaries about the movie, I think the purchase may be 
worthwhile.I have also bought a group of black and white movies from 
Japan, some of them dubbed and some subtitled, and they are very 
interesting. One of them is called"Legend of the Eight Samurai" is 
anyone familair with it? It's a "sword and socerey" type movie. Are 
there any recomendations for other Japanse movies of this type?
         Yours truelly
                captain nemo
